General.Name: Cheng Fwa Industrial Ltd
General.Description: Cheng Fwa Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies precision stamping metal parts in various shapes and sizes for computer, telecommunication, networking, and electronic industries in Taiwan. It provides precise stamping products for air compressors, web camera shields, and tuner chassis; electronic components comprising printer parts, PDA and PDA LCD frames, springs, notebook parts, and panels; and chassis products for communication box, PC chassis, IBM PC chassis, MVC-006X, hub, PC case, Web cam, set top box, and kiosk products, as well as satellite disc antennas. The company also offers inter-process communication products; plastic parts consisting of T-handles, button power products, front panels, Hdd frames, light pipes, POS rear covers, satellite receivers, and cable modems; other industrial products, such as die-casting, LED parts, and automobile parts; and stamping sheet metal parts. In addition, it provides products design, prototype fabrication and low-volume production, tooling design and manufacturing, and mass production services. Further, the company offers OEM, ODM, joint-design and development, processing, assembly, testing, and packaging services. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: 25, Kuang Fu Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 241
